verses.text: \w This|strong="H3541"\w* \w is|strong="H2009"\w* \w what|strong="H3541"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3069"\w* \w GOD|strong="H3068"\w* \w showed|strong="H7200"\w* \w me|strong="H7200"\w*: \w He|strong="H3541"\w* \w was|strong="H4428"\w* \w preparing|strong="H3335"\w* swarms \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w locusts|strong="H1462"\w* just \w after|strong="H5927"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*’s \w harvest|strong="H1488"\w*, \w as|strong="H5927"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* late \w spring|strong="H5927"\w* \w crop|strong="H3954"\w* \w was|strong="H4428"\w* \w coming|strong="H5927"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w*.\f + \fr 7:1 \ft LXX A swarm of locusts coming from the east; and, behold, one grasshopper, king Gog.\f*

\w And|strong="H6965"\w* \w when|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* locusts \w had|strong="H1961"\w* eaten \w every|strong="H6965"\w* green \w plant|strong="H6212"\w* \w in|strong="H6965"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* land, \w I|strong="H3588"\w* said, “\w Lord|strong="H3069"\w* \w GOD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w please|strong="H4994"\w* \w forgive|strong="H5545"\w*! \w How|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H4310"\w* \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w* \w survive|strong="H6965"\w*, \w since|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w so|strong="H1961"\w* \w small|strong="H6996"\w*?”

\w So|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w relented|strong="H5162"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w this|strong="H2063"\w* plan. “\w It|strong="H5921"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w happen|strong="H1961"\w*,” \w He|strong="H3068"\w* said.

\w This|strong="H3541"\w* \w is|strong="H2009"\w* \w what|strong="H3541"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3069"\w* \w GOD|strong="H3068"\w* \w showed|strong="H7200"\w* \w me|strong="H7200"\w*: \w The|strong="H7200"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3069"\w* \w GOD|strong="H3068"\w* \w was|strong="H7227"\w* \w calling|strong="H7121"\w* \w for|strong="H7121"\w* judgment \w by|strong="H7121"\w* fire. \w It|strong="H7121"\w* consumed \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w great|strong="H7227"\w* \w deep|strong="H8415"\w* \w and|strong="H7200"\w* devoured \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w land|strong="H2506"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H6965"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* said, “\w Lord|strong="H3069"\w* \w GOD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w please|strong="H4994"\w* \w stop|strong="H2308"\w*! \w How|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H4310"\w* \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w* \w survive|strong="H6965"\w*, \w since|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w so|strong="H6965"\w* \w small|strong="H6996"\w*?”

\w So|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w relented|strong="H5162"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w this|strong="H2063"\w* plan. “\w It|strong="H1931"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w happen|strong="H1961"\w* \w either|strong="H1571"\w*,” said \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w GOD|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w This|strong="H3541"\w* \w is|strong="H3027"\w* \w what|strong="H3541"\w* \w He|strong="H3027"\w* \w showed|strong="H7200"\w* \w me|strong="H7200"\w*: \w Behold|strong="H2009"\w*, \w the|strong="H5921"\w* Lord \w was|strong="H3027"\w* \w standing|strong="H5324"\w* \w by|strong="H3027"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w wall|strong="H2346"\w* true \w to|strong="H5921"\w* plumb, \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* plumb line \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w His|strong="H5921"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*.

“\w Amos|strong="H5986"\w*, \w what|strong="H4100"\w* \w do|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H7760"\w* \w see|strong="H7200"\w*?” \w asked|strong="H4100"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*. “\w A|strong="H3068"\w* plumb line,” \w I|strong="H2005"\w* replied. “\w Behold|strong="H2005"\w*,” said \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, “\w I|strong="H2005"\w* \w am|strong="H3068"\w* setting \w a|strong="H3068"\w* plumb line \w among|strong="H7130"\w* \w My|strong="H3068"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*; \w I|strong="H2005"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w longer|strong="H5750"\w* \w spare|strong="H5674"\w* \w them|strong="H7760"\w*:

\w The|strong="H5921"\w* \w high|strong="H1116"\w* \w places|strong="H1116"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w Isaac|strong="H3446"\w* \w will|strong="H3478"\w* \w be|strong="H3478"\w* \w deserted|strong="H8074"\w*, \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w sanctuaries|strong="H4720"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w will|strong="H3478"\w* \w be|strong="H3478"\w* \w laid|strong="H8074"\w* \w waste|strong="H2717"\w*; \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w will|strong="H3478"\w* \w rise|strong="H6965"\w* \w up|strong="H6965"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w Jeroboam|strong="H3379"\w* \w with|strong="H1004"\w* \w My|strong="H5921"\w* \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*.” Amaziah Accuses Amos

\w Then|strong="H7971"\w* Amaziah \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Bethel|strong="H1008"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w word|strong="H1697"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w Jeroboam|strong="H3379"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w saying|strong="H1697"\w*, “\w Amos|strong="H5986"\w* \w has|strong="H3478"\w* \w conspired|strong="H7194"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w midst|strong="H7130"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*. \w The|strong="H3605"\w* \w land|strong="H7130"\w* \w cannot|strong="H3808"\w* \w bear|strong="H3557"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w words|strong="H1697"\w*,

\w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w this|strong="H3541"\w* \w is|strong="H3478"\w* \w what|strong="H3541"\w* \w Amos|strong="H5986"\w* \w has|strong="H3478"\w* said: ‘\w Jeroboam|strong="H3379"\w* \w will|strong="H3478"\w* \w die|strong="H4191"\w* \w by|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w will|strong="H3478"\w* \w surely|strong="H4191"\w* \w go|strong="H1540"\w* \w into|strong="H1540"\w* \w exile|strong="H1540"\w*, \w away|strong="H1540"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w their|strong="H5921"\w* homeland.’”

\w And|strong="H3063"\w* Amaziah said \w to|strong="H3212"\w* \w Amos|strong="H5986"\w*, “\w Go|strong="H3212"\w* \w away|strong="H3212"\w*, \w you|strong="H3212"\w* \w seer|strong="H2374"\w*! \w Flee|strong="H1272"\w* \w to|strong="H3212"\w* \w the|strong="H8033"\w* land \w of|strong="H3899"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*; earn \w your|strong="H8033"\w* \w bread|strong="H3899"\w* \w there|strong="H8033"\w* \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w do|strong="H3063"\w* \w your|strong="H8033"\w* \w prophesying|strong="H5012"\w* \w there|strong="H8033"\w*.

\w But|strong="H3588"\w* \w never|strong="H3808"\w* \w prophesy|strong="H5012"\w* \w at|strong="H1004"\w* \w Bethel|strong="H1008"\w* \w again|strong="H5750"\w*, \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w it|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w sanctuary|strong="H4720"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w temple|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w kingdom|strong="H4467"\w*.”

“\w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w was|strong="H1121"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \f + \fr 7:14 \ft Or I am not\f* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w*,” \w Amos|strong="H5986"\w* \w replied|strong="H6030"\w*, “\w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w was|strong="H1121"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \f + \fr 7:14 \ft Or nor am I the son\f* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w*; \w rather|strong="H3588"\w*, \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w was|strong="H1121"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* herdsman \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* tender \w of|strong="H1121"\w* sycamore-fig \w trees|strong="H8256"\w*.

\w But|strong="H3947"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w took|strong="H3947"\w* \w me|strong="H3947"\w* \w from|strong="H3478"\w* \w following|strong="H3212"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w flock|strong="H6629"\w* \w and|strong="H3478"\w* said \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w me|strong="H3947"\w*, ‘\w Go|strong="H3212"\w*, \w prophesy|strong="H5012"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w My|strong="H3068"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.’

\w Now|strong="H6258"\w*, \w therefore|strong="H5921"\w*, \w hear|strong="H8085"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w word|strong="H1697"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*. \w You|strong="H5921"\w* \w say|strong="H1697"\w*: ‘\w Do|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w prophesy|strong="H5012"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*; \w do|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w preach|strong="H5197"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w Isaac|strong="H3446"\w*.’

\w Therefore|strong="H3651"\w* \w this|strong="H3651"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w what|strong="H3541"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w says|strong="H3541"\w*: ‘\w Your|strong="H3068"\w* wife \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w become|strong="H2181"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w prostitute|strong="H2181"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w fall|strong="H5307"\w* \w by|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*. \w Your|strong="H3068"\w* land \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H4191"\w* \w divided|strong="H2505"\w* \w by|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w measuring|strong="H2256"\w* \w line|strong="H2256"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w you|strong="H5921"\w* \w yourself|strong="H5307"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w die|strong="H4191"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* pagan \f + \fr 7:17 \ft Hebrew unclean\f* soil. \w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w surely|strong="H4191"\w* \w go|strong="H1540"\w* \w into|strong="H1540"\w* \w exile|strong="H1540"\w*, \w away|strong="H1540"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* homeland.’”
